pages.text: $(li)The Gold Nugget is a shiny part of the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingot$(/l) that can be crafted placing it in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can obtain it Smelting Gold Armors, Weapons and Tools in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l)$(/l).

$(li)This item can be used in multiple crafts in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br2)$(l) Gold Nugget Recipes$()$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Gold Lanterns$(/l)$(li)Gilded Blackstone$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/glistering_melon_slice)Glistering Melon Slice$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingot$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_carrot)Golden Carrot$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/save_your_pets/golden_pet_bandage)Golden Pet Bandage$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/iron_gold_gates)Gold Gate$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:decoration/others/chains)Gold Chain$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/quark/golden_frog_leg)Golden Frog Leg$(/l)

$(li)Some mobs like $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/voline)Volines$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombified_piglin)Zombified Piglins$(/l) may drop this item on death.$(br)$(li)You can trade with the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/piglin)Piglins$(/l) using your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Gold Nuggets$(/l).
